data.title: PS2 Classics Emulator Compatibility List
data.meta_description: Playstation Development Wiki - PS5, PS4, PS3, PS2, PS1, PSP, Vita Information
data.text:
Name PAL NTSC-U/C NTSC-J Notes Madden NFL 2002 Playable Playable ? Madden NFL 2003 Playable Minor Issues ? From Madden 2003-2007 the NTSC-U/C version will be jittery and has slow down during the play. These issues are not present in the PAL version. Madden NFL 2004 Playable Minor Issues ? From Madden 2003-2007 the NTSC-U/C version will be jittery and has slow down during the play. These issues are not present in the PAL version. Madden NFL 2005 Playable Minor Issues ? From Madden 2003-2007 the NTSC-U/C version will be jittery and has slow down during the play. These issues are not present in the PAL version. Madden NFL 2006 Playable Minor Issues ? From Madden 2003-2007 the NTSC-U/C version will be jittery and has slow down during the play. These issues are not present in the PAL version. Madden NFL 2007 Playable Minor Issues ? From Madden 2003-2007 the NTSC-U/C version will be jittery and has slow down during the play. These issues are not present in the PAL version. Madden NFL 2008 Playable ? ? PAL version is stable. Madden NFL 12 ? Minor Issues Not Available Completely playable, despite minor texture (filtering?) issues on the field and some "jittering" on the image during wide-angle views. Made Man Playable Playable ? Config Available @PSX-Place Mafia Playable Playable ? Works great with the proper config. Magna Carta: Tears of Blood ? Playable ? Seems to be fine, no issues of note. Maken Shao: Demon Sword Playable ? ? No issues noticed. Mana Khemia 2: Fall of Alchemy Not Available Playable ? Manhunt PS2 Classics PS2 Classics Not Available [Homebrew ISO has overpowering light flares/glare. Fix added from official PS2 Classic.

Check Emulator Configuration for further information.] Manhunt 2 Playable Minor Issues Not Available Patched low framerate using Jak v2 emulator and PAL version plays with no hassle. NTSC version works fine but at some point there are framerate drop issue however that won't affect the play. Check emulator configuration. The Mark of Kri PS2 Classics PS2 Classics ? Marc Ecko's Getting Up: Contents Under Pressure Minor Issues Minor Issues ? Noticeable lag during cutscenes; Gameplay is fine Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes ? Playable ? Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects Unplayable Unplayable Unplayable Sound lags frame rate low and thread error on loading screen, this game will never be playable on any ps2 emulator. Marvel Ultimate Alliance ? Playable Not Available Require config file. [1] Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2 ? Minor Issues Not Available Require config file. [1] There are still audio issues, and some framerate issues. Mashed: Drive to Survive Unplayable ? ? Crashes on startup Mashed: Fully Loaded Playable ? ? No known issues Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2 Playable Playable ? Works fine. Matrix, The: Path of Neo Minor Issues Minor Issues ? Intense texture flickering on main menu, and minor texture flickering in FMVs with subtitles enabled. Occasional texture flicker in gameplay, but overall completely playable. Max Payne PS2 Classics PS2 Classics ? Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne Minor Issues ? Not Available Patched green, blue and red graphical issues (PAL version only, not tested for NTSC). The game works well, please check Emu config details here.Just a bug, player must avoid bullet time mode, as this reduces fps to great extent. Maximo: Ghosts to Glory Playable Playable ? Played just under an hour, no glitches or issues evident. Maximo vs. Army of Zin Playable Playable ? Played only 5 minutes but without noticeably glitches McFarlane's Evil Prophecy Playable ? Not Available No known issues MDK 2: Armageddon ? Playable ? Medal of Honor: Frontline Playable Playable ? Config available Medal of Honor: Rising Sun Major Issues Playable ? See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BcN5L9wE__c // SLES-51873/SLUS-20753 In both menu and perforamnce is fine but in first level game crashes with error CE-34878-0. Medal of Honor: European Assault Minor Issues Playable ? Config available for NTSC. The game now runs and it doesn't crash anymore at the first mission , but it could freeze during gameplay for a few seconds , also the game could lag a little bit at the start of missions but it is not persistent. See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fpyZs_B7EY // SLES-53332/SLUS-21199 In both menu and perforamnce is fine but in first level game crashes with error CE-34878-0.//SLES-53333(fr) fixed with Starocean 3 emu. Medal of Honor: Vanguard Playable Playable ? PAL version works fine see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hXVD5fExCGc // SLES-54683/SLUS-21597 In both menu and perforamnce is fine but in first level game crashes with error CE-34878-0. Mega Man Anniversary Collection ? Playable ? No issues noticed. Mega Man X7 ? Major Issues Major Issues Audio is completely broken once you start the game. Voices are garbled and sped up, and music runs at 700% tempo. Mega Man X8 (Megaman X8) Playable Playable Playable No known issues Mega Man X Collection ? Playable ? Works perfect. Mega Man X Command Mission ? Playable ? No known issues. Works perfectly with Jak v2 emu. Uprender 2x2 for a crisp look. (Does not slow down gameplay.) Melty Blood Actress Again Not Available Not Available Playable No known issues. Jakv2 emu used. Metal Arms: Glitch in the System Major Issues ? ? FMVs stutter and there is a pervasive spiky-poly-syndrome glitch going on. Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty Playable Playable Available PAL and NTSC U/C play fine with no patching needed but Substance VR freezes EE error while trying to save also feels like an earthquake happening during the cutscenes. Config with freeze fix here Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance Major Issues Major Issues Unplayable Huge slowdown in Tanker chapter when outside in the rain, otherwise plays fine... also tested out 16:9 Patched .ISO with a 16:9 config, Perfection. (swapping Square with R2 would be nice to avoid the Digital face button issue/limitation... Aim/Shoot instead of having to unequip a weapon to come out of Aiming without discharging... NTSC-J version has less than USA/Europe versions. Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater Unplayable Unplayable Unplayable Significant low framerate (1 fps) issue, resulting the game to be unplayable. Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence Playable Playable ? Same issue as in MGS3 Snake Eater. Config with fix here Metal Saga ? Unplayable ? SatCom black screen issues fixed due to combination of Jak & Daxter Precursor emulator, and config switches. Check Emulator Configuration for additional details. Game freezes during combat. Returned to unplayable status. Metal Slug 3D Not Available Not Available Playable Metal Slug 6 Not Available Not Available Playable No issues at all, working great using Metal Slug Anthology emulator. Metal Slug Anthology PS2 Classics PS2 Classics ? Known in Japan as Metal Slug Complete (メタルスラッグコンプリート) In custom made pkg you need to patch iso to make part 6 work (same as ps3, and pcsx2) MetropolisMania 2 ? Playable ? Included in Japan by the Simple 2000 Series Vol. 39: The Boku no Machi Zukuri: Machi-ing Maker++ (THE ぼくの街づくり〜街ingメーカー++〜) Mercenaries - Playground of Destruction Unplayable Unplayable ? Very low framerate, PAL Version also suffers with low frame rate Mercenaries 2 - World in Flames Unplayable Unplayable ? Very low framerate Mercury Meltdown Remix ? Playable ? Runs flawlessly. Tested on 9.00, PKG created with PS4 PS2 Classics GUI. Michigan: Report From Hell Playable ? ? Seems to work great, no issues detected. Micro Machines V4 ? Playable ? Fully working on jakv2 Midnight Club: Street Racing Playable ? ? Midnight Club ll Playable Playable ? The USA version seems to run more smoother. Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Playable Playable ? cars do not load properly if you enable Try to fix graphics in PS2FPKG V0.6 and sometimes slow fps that's fixed with this config Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix Playable Playable ? cars do not load properly if you enable Try to fix graphics in PS2FPKG V0.6 and sometimes slow fps that's fixed with this config Midway Arcade Treasures ? Minor Issues ? Intro FMV and interviews(in History section of some games) run slow with choppy audio, but all games tested run perfectly Midway Arcade Treasures 2 ? ? ? Midway Arcade Treasures 3 ? Unplayable ? Freezes on startup. Black screen. Minority Report: Everybody Runs Playable Playable ? No known issues Mission: Impossible: Operation Surma Minor Issues ? Major Issues Dance shadow. The japanese version has some issues rather than the U.S. version. Mister Mosquito Minor Issues Minor Issues ? Some furniture textures have a screen of black dirt. Mobile Light Force 2 ? Playable ? Also Known As: Shikigami no Shiro (JP) Mobile Suit Gundam: Encounters in Space ? Playable ? No issues noticed. Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs Zeon ? Playable ? No issues noticed. Mojo! ? Playable ? Mojib-Ribbon Not Available Not Available Playable Has issues with going in-game, Fix here Monopoly ? Unplayable Not Available Freezes on a black screen prior to the language selection menu. Issue related to 0x10003C00 Monster Attack Playable ? Playable Known in Japan as (Simple 2000 Series Vol. 31: The Chikyuu Boueigun (THE地球防衛軍 Za Chikyū Bōeigun) Monster House ? Minor Issues ? Some graphical glitches Monster Hunter ? Playable ? Seems to work great Monster Hunter 2dos Playable ? ? Perfect Monster Lab Unplayable ? ? Black screen. Monster Rancher 3 Minor Issues Minor Issues ? Very very minor graphical glitches that are almost invisible. Monsters inc ? Not Available Not Available Monsters vs. Aliens Minor Issues ? ? Some graphical glitches Mortal Kombat: Armageddon ? Minor Issues ? Small graphical glitches relating to small particles both in Konquest and when in a fight (falling leaves, sparks from metal or lava, etc.) Otherwise, runs perfectly fine. Motor Kombat has some slowdown when too many karts on screen at once. Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance Playable Playable ? Skip initial profile creation screen on first-launch, create save/profile manually once you reach the title screen. No noticeable gameplay/graphical issues. UNPLAYABLE because L1 L2 R2 buttons do not register unable to do combos or load profile NEEDS FIX. Practise mode indicates input working fine on PAL. For USA version works fine, it needs to use Jak v2 in PS2-FPKG v0.4 (also it was tested in PS4 version 9.0). Mortal Kombat: Deception ? Playable ? No noticeable issues. Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks Major Issues Playable ? PAL version, bad graphics, very branded - ntcs Require config file. [1] Motocross Mania 3 ? Minor Issues ? Some tiny FPS drops here and there which also affect audio. MotoGP Available Available Available MotoGP 2 ? ? ? MotoGP 3 Available Available Available MotoGP 4 Playable ? ? works fine. MotoGP 08 Minor Issues Minor Issues ? Some bikes textures are missing. Playable at full speed. MotorStorm: Arctic Edge ? Playable ? Use Config = www.psx-place.com/threads/research-ps2-emulator-configuration-on-ps4.16131/page-168#post-336473 Mr Golf Playable ? ? MS Saga: A New Dawn ? Playable ? No issues noticed whatsoever. MTX Mototrax Unplayable ? ? Freeze in loading after intro video. Mummy Returns, The Minor Issues ? ? Some graphical glitches Music 3000 Unplayable Not Available Not Available Freeze in menu. Musashi: Samurai Legend (Musashiden II: Blade Master) Playable Playable ? seems to run fine at native. Mushihimesama Not Available Not Available Playable Plays perfectly fine.

Also known as "Bug Princess" (虫姫さま). MVP Baseball 2005 ? Playable ? No known issues MX Unleashed ? Playable ? Working fine for me. No real issues. MX Superfly Playable ? ? MX vs. ATV Unleashed ? Major Issues ? Playable, menu and sound is fine, but graphical artifacting when in-game MX vs. ATV Untamed ? Playable ? Mystic Heroes Playable ? ? No known issues (known in Japan as Chou Battle Houshin [バトル封神]) My Street Unplayable ? Not Available Throws an Unhandled PageFault at PS2 logo. Name PAL NTSC-U/C NTSC-J Notes S.L.A.I. Steel Lancer Arena International ? Playable ? Works with no issues with Jak v2 emulator. Game takes a little to start. S.C.A.R Squadra Corse Alfa Romeo Playable Playable ? Works perfect using jakv2. Sakura Taisen: Atsuki Chishio ni ? ? Unplayable Hangs during one of the first scenes, during transition to map selection. Sakura Taisen 3: Paris wa Moeteiru ka ? ? Major Issues Works fine, map loads and works. Has strange visual bug during battles, where everything is too dark, but becoming normal when the player's cursor is on an enemy. It's quite playable, but I wouldn't call it perfect. Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love ? Unplayable Unplayable Tested undub disc. Freezes right before showing the city https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RycaZoOFGws look at 0:20. NTSC-J hangs in the same place. Samurai Aces ? ? Playable Known in Japan as Psikyo Shooting Collection Vol. 2: Sengoku Ace + Sengoku Blade Samurai Champloo: Sidetracked ? Playable ? Works perfectly with Jakv2 emu. DUB works flawlessy. Uprender 2x2 with edge smooth, works for a crisp look. Samurai Jack: The Shadow of Aku ? Minor Issues ? Some graphical glitches Samurai Shodown Anthology Playable Playable ? Homebrew version has substantial performance drops during combat when camera pans out, fixed with Official emulator Configuration found at "SAMURAI SHOWDOWN VI", which is labeled as "Samurai Shodown Anthology" as well. Check Emulator Configuration for additional details. SAMURAI SHODOWN VI PS2 Classics PS2 Classics ? Known in Japan as Samurai Supirittsu Tenkaichi Kenkakuden (サムライスピリッツ 天下一剣客伝) Samurai Warriors Minor Issues ? ? flickering Samurai Warriors Extreme legends Minor Issues ? ? flickering Samurai Warriors 2 Playable Playable ? Fully tested with jakv2 emu Without any issues Samurai Warriors 2 Extreme legends Minor Issues Playable ? Fully tested USA with jakv2 emu Without any issues Samurai Warriors 2 Empires Minor Issues ? ? flickering Samurai Western ? Playable ? Works perfectly with Jakv2 emu. SAS Anti-terror Force ? Playable ? Works with no issues with Jak v2 emulator. Saint Seiya: The Hades Available Not Available Available Saint Seiya: The Sanctuary Available Not Available Available Scaler Playable Playable ? Fully playable. Has extremely minor graphical glitches that are fixed by Using this config Scarface: The World Is Yours Playable Playable ? Fix available @PSX-Place Scooby-Doo! First Frights Playable Playable ? Fix for distorted audio (PAL). Seems to work for the NTSC-U version as well.

Check Emulator Configuration for additional details. Scooby-Doo! and the Spooky Swamp Playable ? ? Fix for distorted audio (PAL).

Check Emulator Configuration for additional details. Scooby-Doo! Night of 100 Frights Playable Playable ? No known issues Scooby-Doo! Unmasked Playable Playable ? No known issues Scooby-Doo! Mystery Mayhem ? Playable ? (Massive visual glitches, cinematics are completely fine) Update: Use Config = www.psx-place.com/threads/research-ps2-emulator-configuration-on-ps4.16131/page-148#post-329939. Link includes configs for all scooby games. Scorpion King: Rise of the Akkadian, The ? Playable ? works fine. Second Sight Playable Playable ? Require config file to fix hang at boot. [1] Secret Agent Clank ? Minor Issues ? Slight frame skipping when loading levels, but otherwise runs fine. Secret Saturdays: Beasts of the 5th Sun, The Playable ? ? No known issues. Secret Service ? Playable ? Tested with Jak v2 emulator, no issues noticed. Seek & Destroy ? Playable ? No issues whatsoever. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 1: Phantasy Star Generation: 1 Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. English translation works when converted to DVD and ESR-patched. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 2: Monaco GP Not Available Not Available Unplayable Black screen visuals, audio playing in the background and can hear menu movement. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 3: Fantasy Zone Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 4: Space Harrier Not Available Not Available Unplayable Black screen. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 5: Golden Axe Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 6: Ichini no Tant-R to Bonanza Bros. Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 7: Columns Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 8: Virtua Racing FlatOut Not Available Not Available Playable Almost perfect, slight polygon texturing corruption in the lower-right angle of screen in external-camera view. Barely noticeable. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 9: Gain Ground Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 10: After Burner II Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 11: Hokuto No Ken Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 12: Puyo Puyo Tsuu Perfect Set Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 13: OutRun Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 14: Alien Syndrome Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 15: Decathlete Collection Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 16: Virtua Fighter 2 Not Available Not Available Unplayable Appalling performance, 2-5fps, with various graphics corruption issues. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 17: Phantasy Star Generation: 2 Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. English translation works when converted to DVD and ESR-patched. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 18: Dragon Force Not Available Not Available Playable Works. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 19: Fighting Vipers Not Available Not Available Unplayable Appalling performance, 2-5fps, with various graphics corruption issues. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 20: Space Harrier II ~Space Harrier Complete Collection~ Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 21: SDI & Quartet: Sega System 16 Collection Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 22: Advanced Daisenryaku: Deutsch Dengeki Sakusen Not Available Not Available ? Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 23: Sega Memorial Selection Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 24: Last Bronx Not Available Not Available Unplayable Appalling performance, 2-5fps, with various graphics corruption issues. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 25: Gunstar Heroes Treasurebox Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 26: Dynamite Deka Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 27: Panzer Dragoon Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 28: Tetris Collection Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 29: Monster World Complete Collection Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 30: Galaxy Force II ~ Special Extended Edition Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 31: Cyber Troopers Virtual-On Not Available Not Available Unplayable Appalling performance, 2-5fps, with various graphics corruption issues. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 32: Phantasy Star Complete Collection Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 33: Fantasy Zone Complete Collection Not Available Not Available Playable Works perfect. Sega Classics Collection ? Major Issues ? Compilation of 9 "Sega Ages 2500" titles; Vol 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 13, and 14. Same inherited issues from standalone volumes; 2+3 do not function. Sega Genesis Collection Available Playable Not Available Works perfectly. All 28 Genesis titles, unlockable Arcade titles, and all videos/special features. [Known as "Sega Mega Drive Collection" in PAL regions] Sega Rally Championship 95 Not Available Not Available Unplayable CD version stops on black PlayStation 2 screen Sega Rally 2006 Not Available Not Available Playable Runs perfect. No issues detected Sega Soccer Slam Unplayable ? ? Stops before loading the menu. Seigi no Mikata (正義の味方) Not Available Not Available Playable Works great. Converted using PS2-FPKG V.06 on Goldhen 2.4b14, PS4 Phat FW 9.0. (September 2023) Sengoku Anthology Playable ? ? Runs perfect. No issues detected. Sengoku Basara X Cross Not Available Not Available Playable Use Jak emu Serious Sam: Next Encounter Unplayable Unplayable Not Available Runs fine but freezes on second level. Maybe fixable? Seven Samurai 20XX (20XX 七人の侍) ? Playable ? No known issues Shadow Man: 2econd Coming Unplayable Unplayable ? NTSC-U crashes with CE-34878-0 error after BIOS with Jakv2 emulator. Shadow Hearts Playable ? Minor Issues Works perfectly. Use RECVX emu for full speed gameplay. NTSC-J using RECVX emu works good, at first glance, however, the models will randomly change colors and generally glitch for reasons unknown. Lotteries will hang. Otherwise works perfectly, cleared fully with good ending. You can't get secret Fusion Monster soul for lotteries not working. Shadow Hearts: Covenant Unplayable Unplayable Unplayable Stops after PS2 logo, PAL: Black screen after FMV. [SLUS21041 crashes after selecting New Game] (known in Japan as Shadow Hearts II [シャドウハーツII]). NTSC-J boots no problem, plays the cutscenes and all, but blackscreens on first location load(actual gameplay). The game doesn't hang and music plays, but the screen is black and no reactions to any button presses.

creating the pkg with --vu1=jit-sync in config allows the level to load, but you will be out of bounds, and unable to move. Also causes strange graphical glitch on the screen with some random model always being there. The game probably can work normally, but requires a lot of research of emulator settings required for it.

Shadow Hearts: From the New World ? Playable ? Tested only version undub [also tested SLUS21326 standard English, seemingly works fine] Shadow of Destiny ? Minor Issues ? Graphical issues with character shadows. AKA Shadow of Memories in Europe. Tested with RogueV1emu Shadow of Rome Major Issues Playable ? Config available for NTSC version @ PSX-Place Shadow of the Colossus Playable Playable ? Very bad performance that can be fully fixed with this Config ( kof98um emu used ) Shadow the Hedgehog Minor Issues Minor Issues ? Both PAL and NTSC versions run fine with JakEMU V2. Minor slowdows in combat on the base ps4 Shadow Tower: Abyss Not Available Not Available Playable JP version works great, has full English translation patch. Shaun Palmer's Pro Snowboarder Minor Issues Minor Issues Unplayable Working fine. Minor graphical glitches. NTSC-J version has many glitches than US and PAL versions. Shaun White Snowboarding Major Issues ? ? Low framerate Shield: The Game, The ? Playable ? Fixed second mission game over error. Check Emulator configuration for details. Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner ? Playable ? Works great with KOF98 emu. Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner 2 ? Playable ? Works great with KOF98 emu. Shin Megami Tensei: Digital Devil Saga ? Minor Issues ? Runs fine with KOF98 emu, only has minor graphical glitches. Shin Megami Tensei: Digital Devil Saga 2 ? Minor Issues ? Runs fine with KOF98 emu, only has minor graphical glitches. Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne (Shin Megami Tensei: Lucifer's Call)

Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne (Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne Maniax) ? Minor Issues Unplayable Noticeable Blurry graphics using "RogueEmu". Most of the blurriness is less noticeable using "Kofemu". Freezes with "Jakemu" during cutscene after meeting the women on the roof of medical centre. The Hardtype Rom Hack also works.The game can randomly crash on a white screen (this is a game bug not emulation related).--fpu-accurate-range=0x137754,0x138014 fixes bug with second ladder in the Assembly of Nihilo but can cause some slowdown (SLUS20911). International versions are unplayable after the player gets to the second ladder in the Assembly of Nihilo, where the prompt for climbing down the ladder never shows up. Otherwise, the game also suffers from minor flickering that doesn't affect the experience (English translated version of "Maniax Chronicle Edition" freezes after a few minutes of play). Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3 FES Playable Playable Playable using kof98um emu. Update: Use config = https://www.psx-place.com/threads/research-ps2-emulator-configuration-on-ps4.16131/page-243#post-382157

NTSC-U tested, FMVs are interlaced and occasionally jump due to this. Aside from that, game is playable. NTSC-J - aside from minor interlacing(about the same as in PCSX2, to note) in FMVs, works perfect.

On second thought, not so perfect. The menu of dropping a persona when you have full stock and get one from shuffle time is not shown. It works, but you can't see it. Not a critical error, otherwise perfect, cleared from start till end+Episode Aegis.

Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4 Playable Playable ? Tested the USA version, Game working perfectly on jakv2, Only extremely minor graphical glitches, for instance when fusing personas the new persona is transparent, only its eyes and weapons appearing, Fixed with Txt config [7] Shining Force EXE ? Playable ? Works perfect. Shining Force Neo ? Playable ? No noticeable issues that I can tell. Shining Tears ? Playable ? No issues whatsoever. Shining Wind ? ? Minor Issues There's an artifact line on all the 2D arts when the characters change expressions. Otherwise perfect. Cleared the whole game twice, unlocked Zero, watched all the scenes with extra Heart Feelings. It's probably the engine, but I have no idea how to fix it. Apparently if you don't stretch the screen to 16:9 there's no bug. Shinobi Playable Playable ? No noticable issues Shinobido Takumi Not Available Not Available Playable Works with Jak emu. Shinobido: Way of the Ninja Playable Not Available ? Known in Japan as Shinobidō: Imashime (忍道 戒) Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula: Road to the Infinity 2 Not Available Not Available Minor Issues very slight flickering in 2D graphics Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula: Road to the Infinity 4 Not Available Not Available Major Issues It doesn't load saved game Shox ? Unplayable ? Shrek 2 Playable ? ? No known issues Silent Hill 2 [Director's Cut] Minor Issues Major Issues ? The FMV at the graveyard early into the game plays with only 1-2 FPS (possibly other cutscenes as well). Tested on multiple emulators. Rest of the game seems to run fine. NTSC versions have broken video output, top half of the screen is useable but the bottom half is a glitchy mess. Silent Hill 3 Playable Major Issues ? FMVs are fine in Jak emu. NTSC version has broken video output, top half of the screen is useable but the bottom half is a glitchy mess, as well as occasional hangups. Silent Hill 4: The Room Playable Playable ? Looks and plays fine in Jak emu. Silent Hill Origins Unplayable Playable ? FMV working flawlessly. All buttons working as normal except analogue stick, as a result you will be standing in front of the truck without doing anything... SLUS_21731 work fine using JAK emu. Silent Hill Shattered Memories Minor Issues Major Issues ? The Animated scenes like interacting with doors or a cutscene have audio stuttering, syncing issues and FPS drops. Gameplay itself works fine SLUS_21899.Pal version sometimes freezes at first loadingscreen Silent Scope ? Playable ? Use Jak and Daxter emu files. Silent Scope 2: Dark Silhouette (Silent Scope 2: Fatal Judgement) Unplayable Playable ? Config here (Known in Japan as Silent Scope 2: Innocent Sweeper) Silent Scope 3 ? Playable ? Silpheed ? Unplayable ? Freezes after publisher logos. Simpsons Game, The ? Major Issues ? Fps drops, graphical glitches and audio stuttering everywhere. Simpsons: Hit & Run, The Playable Playable Not Available NTSC & PAL version Playable with config. Simpsons: Road Rage, The Minor Issues Minor Issues ? EU & US Ver = Playable with Rogue Emu, but has audio and graphics distortion Sims 2, The Minor Issues ? Not Available Disappearing menus and graphical glitches on the sims. UPDATE FIX (does not address white lines on grass) : https://www.psx-place.com/threads/research-ps2-emulator-configuration-on-ps4.16131/page-163#post-335036 Sims 2: Castaway, The ? Playable ? works. Sims 2: Pets, The Minor Issues ? Not Available Disappearing menus and graphical glitches on the sims. UPDATE FIX (does not address white lines on grass): https://www.psx-place.com/threads/research-ps2-emulator-configuration-on-ps4.16131/page-163#post-335036 Sims: Bustin' Out, The ? Minor Issues Not Available Freeze on first logo; bypass this by toggling on the "Skip MPEG hack" setting under Game Fixes. Note this will unfortunately disable video cutscenes. Simple 2000 Series Vol. 105 - The Maid-fuku to Kikanjuu ? ? Minor Issues The game works almost perfectly, but the sniper rifle scope doesn't work properly in stage 3. Getting an S rank there on PS4 is near impossible, and that's required to get all the weapons, thus all the costumes. On PCSX2 easy-peasy. Simple 2000 Series Vol. 113: The Tairyou Jigoku ? ? Unplayable Black screen after playstation 2 logo. Simple 2000 Series Vol. 114 - The Onna Okappichi Torimonochou - Oharu-chan GoGoGo! ? ? Unplayable The game boots, first screen is normal, some menus don't show up, first room of the stage is ok, second is blackscreen, even though the gameplay continues. I don't think that can be called playable. Siratsu tankenbu (Kor name:시라츄 탐험부) Not Available Not Available Playable South Korea Ver(NTSC-J) = playable [SLKA-25109] Siren (Forbidden Siren) PS2 Classics PS2 Classics Playable South Korea Ver(NTSC-J) = playable Siren 2 (Forbidden Siren 2) Unplayable ? Unplayable Game freeze after 1st cutscene. Likely an issue related to the FPU calculation Sitting ducks ? Playable ? Works. SkyGunner ? Playable ? No issues noticed. Sky Odyssey Playable ? ? Issues fixed with Bully V2 emulator. Name PAL NTSC-U/C NTSC-J Notes Taito Legends Available Playable Not Available Taito Legends 2 Available Playable Not Available Tak and the Power of Juju Playable Available Not Available Tales Of Destiny Directors Cut Not Available Not Available Playable Config: --fpu-accurate-mul-fast=1 & --ee-cycle-scalar=1.74 to fix all slowdowns. --gs-use-clut-merge=1, --gs-kernel-cl="clutmerge",--gs-kernel-cl-up="clutmerge2x2" for graphics. --fpu-accurate-range=0x1C7B50,0x1C7C00 to fix control after exiting the menu. Game not fully tested, save often.
